summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 6.0°C) and outside temperature (down 5.3°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 10140 lux), cloud levels (up 723 m), and rainfall (up 0.2 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 11930 lux), rainfall (up 0.2 mm), and cloud levels (up 1670 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 722.9m lower than yesterday, 649.7m lower than the past week, 1670.0m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 1059m to 3380m and averaged 1001.4m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: Cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, air moisture should feel ok. Showers, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and periods of sunshine are expected. Weather could become unsettled.
